title: Avoiding Commitment
description: A sexy angsty second chance romance from USA Today bestselling author K.A. Lindeâ€¦Jack and Lexi never had a typical relationship.After two years without speaking, Lexi receives a phone call that changes everything. Jack wants her to convince his new girlfriend that he's ready to commit.He's calling now, after everything they had been through, because there's another woman. She can't believe it.And yet she goes.For closure.Not to try to win him back. Definitely not.
author: K.A. Linde
